name: Adventurer Bowling
description:
Made for the One Hour Game Jam.

Press WASD to move, Space to jump, and the left / right arrow keys to rotate the camera around the player.

The Big Bad is fed up with those pesky adventurers just AVOIDING his traps. So he's decided to make them home in, by making them sentient.  Was that unnecessary? Yes. But it's also not your business. Your business is crushing some adventurers!
